entry.title: RT Noah: Re @FrancescoCiull4 I 4x'd my income last year going from being a manager at a drive-thru to doing developer relations and technical writer. ...
entry.summary: RT Noah Re @FrancescoCiull4 I 4x'd my income last year going from being a manager at a drive-thru to doing developer relations and technical writer. The traditional software development world wouldn't give me a chance, but web3 employers saw that I was doing the work, and started paying me for it. 🙏

entry.summary: RT Farza 🇺🇸 🇵🇰 I've met 100s of insane builders these last few weeks based in various places -- India, Brazil, Nigeria, and more. Nearly all were in the middle of visa issues. We're exploring this problem at @_buildspace. True "digital citizens" shouldn't feel constrained by their passport.

entry.summary: RT JosefJe.eth If you are an event organizer in the Ethereum/Crypto space and you'd like to attend @ETHPrague and just enjoy networking and talks without strings attached (talk/work), send me a DM. We'd be happy to have you. You deserve to be treated for once!
